name: Advertising, Af
what_you_do: Adrian D. Parker is a leader in the advertising industry, recognized for his pioneering work in creativity, technology, and diversity, and he empowers courageous change in work, family, and faith through various platforms including a podcast.
who_you_serve: He serves individuals and organizations looking to embrace change and creativity, particularly in the realms of advertising and personal development.
offering: Podcast access, speaking engagements, mentorship, and insights on embracing failure and leadership.
bio: Inducted into the American Advertising Hall of Achievement in 2020, featured in various media outlets including Adweek and Fox Business.
business_focus: Adrian D. Parker is a leader in the advertising industry, recognized for his pioneering work in creativity, technology, and diversity, and he empowers courageous change in work, family, and faith through various platforms including a podcast.
